description.en: When charged with an Ark Reactor, they can fire repulsor beams. For female characters.
description.ar: When charged with an Ark Reactor, they can fire repulsor beams. For female characters.
description.br: Quando carregados com um Reator Ark, eles podem disparar feixes de energia repulsores. Para personagens femininos.
description.cns: 当用方舟反应堆充能时，这些手套可以发射排斥光束。 使用女性角色。
description.fi: When charged with an Ark Reactor, they can fire repulsor beams. For female characters.
description.fil: When charged with an Ark Reactor, they can fire repulsor beams. For female characters.
description.fr: Avez-vous la main de velours pour aller avec ?
description.id: Ketika diisi dengan Ark Reactor, mereka dapat menembakkan balok tolakan. Untuk karakter wanita.
description.it: When charged with an Ark Reactor, they can fire repulsor beams. For female characters.
description.jp: アークリアクターで充電すると、リパルサービームを発射できます。
description.kr: Ark Reactor로 충전하면 리 펄서 빔을 발사 할 수 있습니다. 여성 캐릭터 용.
description.nl: When charged with an Ark Reactor, they can fire repulsor beams. For female characters.
description.pl: When charged with an Ark Reactor, they can fire repulsor beams. For female characters.
description.ru: Силовые перчатки для мадригалки. Стреляют импульсными зарядами! Если есть источник питания, конечно.
description.sp: Cuando se cargan con un Reactor Ark, estos guantes pueden disparar rayos repulsores. Para Personajes Femeninos.
description.sw: When charged with an Ark Reactor, they can fire repulsor beams. For female characters.
description.th: เมื่อชาร์จด้วย Ark Reactor พวกเขาสามารถยิงลำแสงขับไล่ได้ สำหรับตัวละครหญิง
description.vi: Khi được sạc bằng Lò phản ứng hồ quang, chúng có thể bắn ra chùm tia đẩy. Đối với các nhân vật nữ.
